title: Juventus' Blaise Matuidi claims to have been racially abused for second time in 10 days
description: Juventus midfielder Blaise Matuidi has slammed supporters he claims subjected him to racist abuse for the second time in 10 days.
content: The France international revealed on Facebook he was abused during Saturday's Serie A clash with Cagliari, which his side won 1-0 thanks to a goal from Federico Bernardeschi.Matuidi appeared to ask the referee to intervene in the incident before half-time and again tackled the issue in a post on social media later on Saturday.He wrote: "Thanks for all your messages. Today I experienced racism during the match."Weak people try to intimidate with hate. I am not a hater and can only be sorry for those who set bad examples."Football is a way to spread equality, passion and inspiration and this is what I am here for. Peace. #equalgame"Matuidi suffered similar abuse on December 30 during his side's clash with Verona, who were fined Â£18,000 and given a partial stadium ban which was suspended for a year.
